title: Building the Future with Passion:
description: Hello, my name is Pedro Comas and I am someone passionate about computing, technology and software development. The beginning of the quarantine marked a change in me personally, from there I decided to deepen my previous knowledge with the aim of being able to give my family a better life.

billy.title: Billy Coleman Porfolio
billy.description: A Showcase of the work produced by the professional photographer Billy Coleman, one of my first clients while working as a freelance.

frenzy.title: Frenzy Media
frenzy.description: The website of the Digital agency Frenzy Media, the agency centers itself on creating personalized advertisements and content for its clients to amplify their reach and revenue online.
